Apprentice Atra:
The Mucrokians spread the contamination throughout the region. They must be exterminated.
Kill Mucrokian Fanatics, Mucrokian Ascetics, Mucrokian Saviors, Mucrokian Prophets, Contaminated Mucrokians, and Awakened Mucrokians. To futher advance our cause, collect Mucrokian Hide. When you have enough, you will learn to distinguish Quality Mucrokian Hide. If you bring those back to me, the movement will happily reward you.
And if you collect enough, I will exchange them for Dynasty accessory recipes.
